page.title: 05THE QUARRY
page.content: THE QUARRY __________ The main industry in our area is the PENRHYN SLATE QUARRY .It employs about 250 men,but during the early 1900's there were nearly 3000 men working there.That is how our village started,with the men moving here to work in the quarry.It makes roofing slates and granite chippings for road surfacing.It is the largest open cast quarry in the world. We are not allowed to visit the quarry because it is very dangerous there.They have lorries and cranes to dig out the slate,but in the old days the men used to blast it out of the mountain.Men are still needed to split the slate_no machine can ever do that accurately.The slate tips are an eyesore in our beautiful countryside.
